mapper.insert: insert into review (userid, productid, content, reviewdate, rating) values (#{userId},#{productId},#{content},now(),#{rating})
insert into reply (reviewid, content, replydate) values (#{replyId},#{content},now())
mapper.update: update product set producttotalrate = (select avg(rating) from review where productId = #{productId}) where productId = #{productId}
